price: 57. Ne crois surtout pas que ceux qui ont mécru puissent jamais mettre au défi la puissance (d’Allah) sur terre. Leur séjour sera le Feu, et quel horrible devenir !
arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru
